1) Open file to read
2) Open file to write
3) Open file to append the data
4) Close file
5) Read the lines into list
6) Move the curser
7) Get where is curser
Appending: New content!!!appending:Andhra Pradesh witnesses a worrying trend of juvenile crime, with 80-90 minors apprehended monthly. A recent case involving three minors kidnapping, raping, and murdering an eight-year-old girl highlights the severity of the issue.
